summary: Imagine Sirius going on a date, and Lupin being all jealous.
title: Imagine Sirius going on a date, and Lupin being all jealous.
body:
*In the common room. Sirius getting all sexy for his girl-date*

Sirius: ‘’Damn. I look smoking. I’ll probably get laid.’’

*Lupin whispering from the corner*

Remus: ‘’You will probably give her flees..’’
Sirius: ‘’What..?’’
Remus: ‘‘What..?’‘

Hi! I am Lily and I am back from the dead, this is my writing blog. I do Headcanons, Asks and Preferences for all kinds of fandoms. Requests are closed
only ;) sfw ;) on my ;) good ;) christian ;) blog;)

summary: Preference: The Marauders with an introverted S/O
body:
Preference: The Marauders with an introverted S/O

Sirius is the kind of person that can see things from both an intro and extroverted point of view. He will encourage his s/o to try new things in a way that isnt pushy and aggravating, but loving and understanding.

Remus will never push you to do things, he will just accompany you to study or chill out. He is usually too exhausted from his little secret and his friends to do much else. He just loves you for you.

James is like Sirius but with no tact. Does he mean well? Yes. But he just comes off as a bit of a jerk. He just wants to mess around with his lover under his arm all the while.

Preference: The Marauders with an introverted S/O

Sirius is the kind of person that can see things from both an intro and extroverted point of view. He will encourage his s/o to try new things in a way that isnt pushy and aggravating, but loving and understanding.

Remus will never push you to do things, he will just accompany you to study or chill out. He is usually too exhausted from his little secret and his friends to do much else. He just loves you for you.

James is like Sirius but with no tact. Does he mean well? Yes. But he just comes off as a bit of a jerk. He just wants to mess around with his lover under his arm all the while.

summary: 💋 + Severus Snape and showing affection after a hard day at work  Please and thank you :-) :-) :-)
question: 💋 + Severus Snape and showing affection after a hard day at work  Please and thank you :-) :-) :-)
answer:
No problem, lovely! This was really nice to write :)

Severus showing affection after a hard day would include:

  • You know immediately when Severus has had a hard day. He will come into your shared room all grumpy and frustrated, only being able to mumble a response to anything you’ll say to him.
  • It doesn’t take you that long to get him to warm up to you. And he knows that, it’s why he will let you and no one else close to him in those times. With the right look or the simplest action, you’re able to calm every single nerve in his body.
  • He’ll let you sit close to him and can’t get enough of the way you will place your hand on his arm or leg if the two of you have to eat dinner in the Great Hall. And when you are finally alone, he’ll let you cuddle up right close to him, his hand so delicately rested on top of yours.
  • He’s not an affectionate man, but slowly over the years, he has let you become closer to him, opening up a part to himself he never thought was possible. That simple fact is able to calm him down instantly, reminding him that with you, he is not the cold monster that people think he is.
  • Whenever you are sat close to him or have your head resting on his chest, he can’t help but lean over and place a soft and tender kiss to your forehead.

HP tags: @xxerwin4laypxx @xxsophie-raabxx @yeeterbenjaminparker @bitchinghourss @sly-vixen-up2nogood

Tess’ 1k Celebration

title: Iridescent : Holly storms Hogwarts
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Su4bEw

by Orahime

Holly enters her first year of Hogwarts, a school that houses a mysterious room on the third corridor. At least she has her brother supporting her, and her soulmates flanking either side. Fred laughs, George frets, Neville worries, and Draco flaunts. Holly thinks its just a normal day in her normal life. Sequel to Effervescence.

Words: 7944, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Effervescence

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy, Neville Longbottom, Fred Weasley, George Weasley, Hermione Granger, Hannah Abbott, Susan Bones, Justin Finch-Fletchley, Megan Jones (Harry Potter), Ernie Macmillan, Kevin Entwhistle, Leanne (Harry Potter), Stephen Cornfoot, Wayne Hopkins, Ron Weasley, Percy Weasley, Lee Jordan, Lily Evans Potter, James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Lucius Malfoy, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Alice Longbottom, Frank Longbottom, Molly Weasley, Arthur Weasley

summary: Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald é uma das 10 maiores bilheterias de 2018
title: Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald é uma das 10 maiores bilheterias de 2018
description:
De acordo com o site BoxOfficeGuru.com, o segundo capítulo da série Animais Fantásticos chegou à décima posição no ranking dos filmes com maior bilheteria do ano, levando em consideração a bilheteria de todos os mercados, arrecadando o total de 601 milhões de dólares.

O filme ficou atrás de sucessos como Vingadores: Guerra Infinita (2,05 bilhões de dólares), Pantera Negra (1,35 bilhão), Os Incriveis 2 (1,24 bilhão) e Venom (855 milhões).

(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Na última semana, a sexta de exibição da película, o filme levou mais de três milhões de brasileiros ao cinema, arrecadando um total de R$ 447 mil, atrás apenas de lançamentos mais recentes como Aquaman e O Retorno de Mary Poppins e Bohemian Rhapsody, em sua oitava semana de exibição.

The post Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald é uma das 10 maiores bilheterias de 2018 appeared first on Potterish.com.

tags: and any other fandoms y'all are into
summary: Was randomly thinking about one of my old Eragon fanfictions tonight and started laughing to myself because I remembered that I...
body:
Was randomly thinking about one of my old Eragon fanfictions tonight and started laughing to myself because I remembered that I wrote in a magic spell, oedji, that would shove someone’s underwear up their crack…

And suddenly I had a rush of affection for my teenage self and her weird fanfictions, because, much as I love to hate on them (and rightly so, some of them were ridiculously awful), tiny me was actually super creative and came up with some truly hilarious crap.

Like:

-Star Wars: invented a whole new side to the Force. In addition to the Light Side and the Dark Side, there was the Blonde Side, made up of not-good, not-evil, slightly-mean blonde girls who were obvious stand-ins for all the popular girls I resented.

-Harry Potter: I shipped Moaning Myrtle with Cedric Diggory’s ghost.

-Twilight: I really hated Renesmee so I dumped on her every chance I got. In one fic she broke up with Jacob, married a Volturi, and went off to start sucking people’s blood for funsies, leaving Jacob to hook up with Bella’s high school frenemy.

Fanfic writers, reblog with the weirdest/most genius thing your tiny self ever wrote into a fanfic! No shame whatsoever. I still vividly remember reading a fic where Eragon sang “Get Down” by the Backstreet Boys to Arya at an elven festival, and my fourteen-year-old brain thought it was the most amazing fic I had ever read in my life…

reblog.comment:

And suddenly I had a rush of affection for my teenage self and her weird fanfictions, because, much as I love to hate on them (and rightly so, some of them were ridiculously awful), tiny me was actually super creative and came up with some truly hilarious crap.

Like:

-Star Wars: invented a whole new side to the Force. In addition to the Light Side and the Dark Side, there was the Blonde Side, made up of not-good, not-evil, slightly-mean blonde girls who were obvious stand-ins for all the popular girls I resented.

-Harry Potter: I shipped Moaning Myrtle with Cedric Diggory’s ghost.

-Twilight: I really hated Renesmee so I dumped on her every chance I got. In one fic she broke up with Jacob, married a Volturi, and went off to start sucking people’s blood for funsies, leaving Jacob to hook up with Bella’s high school frenemy.

Fanfic writers, reblog with the weirdest/most genius thing your tiny self ever wrote into a fanfic! No shame whatsoever. I still vividly remember reading a fic where Eragon sang “Get Down” by the Backstreet Boys to Arya at an elven festival, and my fourteen-year-old brain thought it was the most amazing fic I had ever read in my life…

trail.content_raw:
Was randomly thinking about one of my old Eragon fanfictions tonight and started laughing to myself because I remembered that I wrote in a magic spell, oedji, that would shove someone’s underwear up their crack…

And suddenly I had a rush of affection for my teenage self and her weird fanfictions, because, much as I love to hate on them (and rightly so, some of them were ridiculously awful), tiny me was actually super creative and came up with some truly hilarious crap.

Like:

-Star Wars: invented a whole new side to the Force. In addition to the Light Side and the Dark Side, there was the Blonde Side, made up of not-good, not-evil, slightly-mean blonde girls who were obvious stand-ins for all the popular girls I resented.

-Harry Potter: I shipped Moaning Myrtle with Cedric Diggory’s ghost.

-Twilight: I really hated Renesmee so I dumped on her every chance I got. In one fic she broke up with Jacob, married a Volturi, and went off to start sucking people’s blood for funsies, leaving Jacob to hook up with Bella’s high school frenemy.

Fanfic writers, reblog with the weirdest/most genius thing your tiny self ever wrote into a fanfic! No shame whatsoever. I still vividly remember reading a fic where Eragon sang “Get Down” by the Backstreet Boys to Arya at an elven festival, and my fourteen-year-old brain thought it was the most amazing fic I had ever read in my life…
trail.content:

And suddenly I had a rush of affection for my teenage self and her weird fanfictions, because, much as I love to hate on them (and rightly so, some of them were ridiculously awful), tiny me was actually super creative and came up with some truly hilarious crap.

Like:

-Harry Potter: I shipped Moaning Myrtle with Cedric Diggory’s ghost.

-Twilight: I really hated Renesmee so I dumped on her every chance I got. In one fic she broke up with Jacob, married a Volturi, and went off to start sucking people’s blood for funsies, leaving Jacob to hook up with Bella’s high school frenemy.

Fanfic writers, reblog with the weirdest/most genius thing your tiny self ever wrote into a fanfic! No shame whatsoever. I still vividly remember reading a fic where Eragon sang “Get Down” by the Backstreet Boys to Arya at an elven festival, and my fourteen-year-old brain thought it was the most amazing fic I had ever read in my life…

title: Iridescent : Holly storms Hogwarts
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Su4bEw

by Orahime

Holly enters her first year of Hogwarts, a school that houses a mysterious room on the third corridor. At least she has her brother supporting her, and her soulmates flanking either side. Fred laughs, George frets, Neville worries, and Draco flaunts. Holly thinks its just a normal day in her normal life. Sequel to Effervescence.

Words: 7944, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Effervescence

  • Rating: General Audiences

summary: Festivus for the Rest of Us! More Drarry double life AU please?
question: Festivus for the Rest of Us! More Drarry double life AU please?
answer:
Harry agrees to the unbreakable vow with barely a hesitation. The Dursleys must really be awful. But at least Draco doesn’t have to worry about Harry spilling his secret if he figures it out. 

Which, he thinks Gram being a muggle is a little hard to miss, but also Harry is not the most observant of people. 

That can’t be said of everyone. 

Harry has been in the spare bedroom less than a day when Mina shows up at his door scowling. “You moved your boytoy in and you didn’t tell me? You’re the worst summer boyfriend ever.” 

“There’s so much wrong with what you just said,” he says, pained, “please never repeat any of it ever again.”

summary: William Nott - OPEN  Faction: Death Eaters War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with...
caption:
William Nott - OPEN
Faction: Death Eaters

War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with their views, joining the Death Eaters has never been something he’s really wanted. It is too dangerous, too unclean. But pressures from his Pureblood family pushed him to take the Dark Mark and though he fears where it will lead him, he’s taken to Lord Voldemort’s cause with the same cleverness and eloquence that he applies to everything in his life.

Nott is not just a Death Eater, he’s a writer, a creator of stories, but the one that must be told now is his own. Will you be the one to write it?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs
